May 7, 2016 D Deutsche Brass Band Meisterschaft (1st Division)
Deutsche Brass Band Meisterschaft (1st Division) 1 Test Piece Contest Deutsche Brass Band Meisterschaft deutsche-brass-band-meisterschaft-1st-division
Germany
First
Set Test and Own Choice
Blackout
Regentenbau (Max Littmann-Saal), Bad Kissingen, Bavaria, Germany Set Work on May 7th, Own Choice on May 8th.
Best Section: Trombones, YBB NRW Best Soloist: Bernd Geser - Euphonium, 3BA Concert Band
Contest from now on every 2 Years (decided after there was no DBBM due to EBBC 2015 in Freiburg). A Junior Section was discussed for 2016, maybe instead of the 4th Section, that had again no Entries.
Aug. 28, 2015, 9:18 p.m. March 8, 2018, 12:58 p.m.
1 3ba-brass Thomas Ludescher Variations and Fugue
2 Brass Band Sachsen Bryan Allen Red Priest
3 Youth Brass Band Nordrhein-Westfalen Martin Schädlich On the Shoulders of Giants
4 Cologne Concert Brass Heinrich Schmidt On Alderley Edge
5 Brass Band Schwaben Benjamin Markl Paganini Variations
6 Brass Band A7 Johnny Ekkelboom Helvetia
7 Brass Band Oberschwaben-Allgäu Ueli Kipfer Music of the Spheres
